ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
python_min:
- '3.10'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Developer tool for scientific Python libraries
Developer tool for scientific Python libraries
Developer tool for scientific Python libraries
Developer tool for scientific Python libraries

name: spin

about.summary: Developer tool for scientific Python libraries
Developer tool for scientific Python libraries

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: spin
  version: "0.16"

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/${{ name[0] }}/${{ name }}/spin-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: ce62fb15fd225cde2601a4c969807557d34e461cbc6575c6bbe1a4502ea0dca6

build:
  number: 2
  # package cannot be noarch since there is a python version based dependency
  # noarch: python
  script: ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  python:
    entry_points:
      - spin = spin.__main__:main

requirements:
  build:
    # This section can be removed when noarch python is used again
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - python
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
  host:
    # This line can be uncommented when noarch python is used again
    # - python ${{ python_min }}.*
    - python
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    # This line can be uncommented when noarch python is used again
    # - python >=${{ python_min }}
    - python
    - if: match(python, "<3.11")
      then: click >=8, <8.2
      else: click >=8,!=8.3.0,<8.4
    - tomli
    - importlib-metadata >=7.0
    - if: win
      then: colorama
    # These lines can be uncommented when noarch python is used again
    # - if: unix
    #   then: __unix
    # - if: win
    #   then: __win

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - spin
      # This line can be uncommented when noarch python is used again
      # python_version: ${{ python_min }}.*
  - requirements:
      run:
        # - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - pip
    script:
      - pip check

about:
  summary: Developer tool for scientific Python libraries
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE
  homepage: https://github.com/scientific-python/spin

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - stefanv
    - rgommers
    - lucascolley

about.summary: Developer tool for scientific Python libraries
